main_definition: Gaps refer to spaces, intervals or missing elements in various contexts such as physical space, knowledge, skills, etc.

meanings_and_examples.example: There were gaps in the fence that needed to be filled.
The report had several gaps regarding its data collection methods.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Intervals between time points or events
meanings_and_examples.example: There were noticeable gaps in his attendance at work.
She has a gap in her education due to taking a break for personal reasons.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Places where something is not complete or whole
meanings_and_examples.example: There were gaps in the puzzle pieces that couldn't be used.
